properties.name: OrganizationUnitID
properties.description:
This will be the OrganizationUnit that will be supplied to by the supplier.

If neither OrganizationUnitID or OrganizationUnitSetID or OrganizationUnitIDs are specified then all children of the supplier are automatically supplied to.

properties.name: OrganizationUnitIDs
properties.description:
These will be the OrganizationUnits that will be supplied to by the supplier.

If neither OrganizationUnitID or OrganizationUnitSetID or OrganizationUnitIDs are specified then all children of the supplier are automatically supplied to.

properties.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
properties.description:
The OrganizationUnits in this set will be the OrganizationUnits that will be supplied to by the supplier.
Adding OrganizationUnits to this set in the future will not result in those OrganizationUnits being automatically added to this collection.

If neither OrganizationUnitID or OrganizationUnitSetID or OrganizationUnitIDs are specified then all children of the supplier are automatically supplied to.

properties.name: SupplierOrganizationUnitID
properties.description:
This will be the OrganizationUnit that becomes the supplier in this supplier relationship.

Either SupplierOrganizationUnitID or SupplierOrganizationUnitSetID or SupplierOrganizationUnitIDs must be specified to be a valid request.

properties.name: SupplierOrganizationUnitIDs
properties.description:
These will be the OrganizationUnits that becomes the suppliers in this supplier relationship.

Either SupplierOrganizationUnitID or SupplierOrganizationUnitSetID or SupplierOrganizationUnitIDs must be specified to be a valid request.

properties.name: SupplierOrganizationUnitSetID
properties.description:
The OrganizationUnits in this set will be the OrganizationUnits that will be the suppliers

Either SupplierOrganizationUnitID or SupplierOrganizationUnitSetID or SupplierOrganizationUnitIDs must be specified to be a valid request.

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
